title-group.article-title: THE FROBENIUS PROBLEM FOR NUMERICAL SEMIGROUPS WITH EMBEDDING DIMENSION EQUAL TO THREE

abstract.p: Let S be a numerical semigroup with embedding dimension equal to three. Assume that the minimal generators of S are pairwise relatively prime numbers. Under these conditions, we give semi-explicit formulas for the Frobenius number, the genus, and the set of pseudo-Frobenius numbers of S. Moreover, if the multiplicity of S is fixed, then these formulas become explicit.
